summary: I think Liam mentioned once that if Vax had been accepted in Syngorn society he would have become a really bad solider or...
body: I think Liam mentioned once that if Vax had been accepted in Syngorn society he would have become a really bad solider or something and now I want to write an AU. Like, his father reluctantly gives him a recommendation to a battalion. Vax joins as a foot solider. The battalion goes to the Emerald Outpost to join a cross-city meeting on how to deal with dragons. etc etc it could be some good quality content you guys.

blog.name: fisherrend
blog.title: DnD Creations
blog.description: Self-taught creative mind from Sweden. There is nothing I love more than to draw, write and make shit up. Here you will find maps, characters, races, monsters, original characters, fan characters and other bits and pieces made, drawn or written by me. All homebrew content is available for public use; just don't claim it as your own. Please do share though if you use anything I've made, I'd love to showcase your creations!

summary: Tails of Equestria
body:
Tails of Equestria

Just started watching this one shot from Critical Role.

A lot of you might not know that I started my time on tumblr as a my little pony artist. Back then I hated drawing feet and hands, and ponies don’t have either so it was great! I still miss it time to time. I had a great time in that fandom.

And now I sort of want to draw the Mighty Nein and/or my original characters as ponies.

summary: I mean like an AU where the instead of summoning Frumpkin for the first time, Caleb found a bengal who was unusually terrified...
question: I mean like an AU where the instead of summoning Frumpkin for the first time, Caleb found a bengal who was unusually terrified of the water for their breed since Caleb knows that his Frumpkin was fond of the water. And like. That's Nott.
answer:
Oh so instead of being made into a goblin she somehow ended up becoming a fey spirit from whatever that woman did? And she got called and made to appear like a cat for Caleb? 

That sounds really cool! She could probably also communicate to him somehow to explain she isn’t really a fey familiar if needed, because she can write and all that.

Cat!Nott, curious, very interesting…

reblog.comment:

summary: Which thing you've written for CR are you most proud of?
question: Which thing you've written for CR are you most proud of?
answer: Hmm, I’m not all that sure. I love all my stories, its why I write them, but at the moment I’m really proud of my warlock!Nott fics. I love her as that class at the moment and it’s fun to write for.

summary: Thinking about Ned and Nott. Both are characters with a penchant for stealing, who don’t like themselves very much, who maybe...
body:
Thinking about Ned and Nott.

Both are characters with a penchant for stealing, who don’t like themselves very much, who maybe think their impact on other people is too insignificant to matter. 

Their character arcs directly contradict their perceptions of themselves.  It shows their growth from people who were closed off and guarded, who viewed themselves as cowardly and undeserving, to people who are trying their best to do better. They’ve made connections with others, pushed past their fears and improved themselves, even if they struggle to see it. They’ve stumbled, made costly mistakes, but pressed on for those they treasure. 

Both are loved more than they realize, and far braver than they give themselves credit for.
